expression-projection.text: CASEWHENdf.growth=0THEN'Size is fixed.'WHENdf.growth>0ANDdf.is_percent_growth=0THEN'Growth value is MB.'WHENdf.growth>0ANDdf.is_percent_growth=1THEN'Growth value is a percentage.'END
